games.name: Starfield
games.description: A highly anticipated space exploration RPG developed by Bethesda Softworks, set in a scientifically accurate universe.

games.name: Elden Ring
games.description: An open-world fantasy game developed by FromSoftware, featuring a dark and intricate world crafted in collaboration with George R.R. Martin.

games.name: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: A futuristic open-world RPG developed by CD Projekt Red, set in the vast urban landscape of Night City.

games.name: NHL 24
games.description: The thirty-third installment in a series of hockey sports games featuring improved physics and animations.

games.name: PayDay 3
games.description: A co-op online action game where players play the role of criminals carrying out daring raids.

games.name: Lords of the Fallen 2
games.description: A sequel to the successful action RPG set in a dark fantasy world.

games.name: Fae Farm
games.description: A farming RPG with an action emphasis, featuring exploration and threats.

games.name: Detective Pikachu Returns
games.description: A sequel to the detective adventure game starring Pokemon's Pikachu.

games.name: Cities: Skylines II
games.description: A city builder economic strategy game where players manage a city.

games.name: Beneath Oresa
games.description: A production with roguelike and card game elements set in an underground city.

games.name: New World: Rise of the Angry Earth
games.description: The first paid DLC to the MMORPG New World, introducing mounts.

games.name: Bang-On Balls: Chronicles
games.description: A 3D platformer featuring stages inspired by different historical periods.

games.name: Cocoon
games.description: A puzzle adventure game where players travel between worlds contained in small spheres.

games.name: Moonstone Island
games.description: An adventure game with RPG and life sim elements set in a fantasy world of floating islands.

games.name: Football Manager 2024
games.description: The twentieth main installment in a bestselling series of sports managers.

games.name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless
games.description: The seventh installment of a series of strategy-tactical RPGs set in a demonic realm.

games.name: Front Mission 2: Remake
games.description: A remake of the 1997 tactical Japanese RPG featuring turn-based combat missions.

games.name: Wargroove 2
games.description: A turn-based tactical strategy game inspired by Fire Emblem and Advance Wars.

games.name: Star Trek: Infinite
games.description: A strategy game based on the Star Trek license developed by Nimble Giant Entertainment.

games.name: Sword Art Online Last Recollection
games.description: A Japanese action RPG based on a popular media franchise, featuring both singleplayer and multiplayer modes.

games.name: The Last of Us Part II
games.description: A narrative-driven game following Ellie's harrowing journey in a post-apocalyptic world.

games.name: Hades
games.description: A roguelike game where players control Zagreus, the son of Hades, as he tries to escape the underworld.

games.name: Doom Eternal
games.description: A fast-paced shooter game where players fight through hordes of demonic enemies.

games.name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
games.description: A relaxing game where players live on an island and interact with anthropomorphic animal villagers.

games.name: Ghost of Tsushima
games.description: An open-world game set in feudal Japan, following a samurai's quest to protect his home.

games.name: Final Fantasy VII Remake
games.description: A remake of the classic RPG, following Cloud Strife and his allies against the corrupt Shinra corporation.

games.name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
games.description: A challenging game set in Sengoku-era Japan, following a shinobi named Wolf on a mission to rescue his kidnapped lord and seek revenge.

games.name: Resident Evil 2 Remake
games.description: A remake of the classic survival horror game, set in a zombie-infested Raccoon City.

games.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.description: An open-world RPG following Geralt of Rivia on his quest to find his missing adopted daughter.

games.name: Bloodborne
games.description: A dark and atmospheric game set in the gothic city of Yharnam, known for its challenging gameplay.

games.name: Dark Souls III
games.description: The final chapter in the critically acclaimed Dark Souls series, known for its challenging gameplay and dark fantasy world.

games.name: Overwatch
games.description: A team-based shooter with a diverse cast of heroes, each with unique abilities.

games.name: Fortnite
games.description: A free-to-play game where 100 players fight to be the last one standing.

games.name: PUBG
games.description: A battle royale game where players parachute onto an island and scavenge for weapons to survive.

games.name: Hollow Knight
games.description: An indie game where players explore a vast interconnected world, known for its challenging gameplay and beautiful hand-drawn art.

games.name: Celeste
games.description: A critically acclaimed platformer known for its tight controls, challenging gameplay, and touching narrative.

games.name: Monster Hunter World
games.description: A game where players hunt down massive monsters, alone or with friends, and use their parts to craft powerful gear.

games.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: An open-world game set in the American frontier, with a rich narrative and highly detailed world.

games.name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
games.description: A crossover fighting game featuring characters from a wide variety of video game franchises.

games.name: Apex Legends
games.description: A free-to-play battle royale game known for its fast-paced action and team-based gameplay.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.description: A historical action-adventure game set in the Viking age, featuring exploration and combat.

games.name: Among Us
games.description: A multiplayer party game where players work together on a spaceship but some are impostors out to sabotage the mission.

games.name: Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout
games.description: A massively multiplayer party game with up to 60 players online in a free-for-all struggle through round after round of escalating chaos until one victor remains!

games.name: Genshin Impact
games.description: An open-world action RPG game where players explore a fantasy world and seek the lost sibling.

games.name: Phasmophobia
games.description: A co-op ghost hunting adventure where players investigate haunted locations and gather evidence of paranormal activity.

games.name: Baldur's Gate 3
games.description: An RPG game based on Dungeons & Dragons, featuring a rich story and deep character customization.

games.name: Cyber Shadow
games.description: An action platformer game with a retro aesthetic, following a ninja on a quest to rescue his clan.

games.name: It Takes Two
games.description: A co-op action-adventure game where players control a couple navigating through fantastical challenges.

games.name: Little Nightmares II
games.description: A suspense adventure game where players navigate through a disturbing world to discover its dark secrets.

games.name: Returnal
games.description: A third-person shooter roguelike game where players control a space pilot stranded on an alien planet.

games.name: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart
games.description: An interdimensional adventure where players control Ratchet and his robot friend Clank as they battle evil forces across multiple worlds.

games.name: Resident Evil Village
games.description: A survival horror game set in a village filled with mutant creatures, part of the Resident Evil franchise.

games.name: Deathloop
games.description: An action-adventure game where players are stuck in a time loop, tasked with eliminating eight targets before midnight.

games.name: Kena: Bridge of Spirits
games.description: A story-driven action-adventure game following a young spirit guide as she helps deceased people move on to the afterlife.

games.name: Back 4 Blood
games.description: A cooperative first-person shooter game where players fight off hordes of infected.

games.name: Forza Horizon 5
games.description: An open-world racing game set in Mexico, featuring a wide variety of cars and races.

games.name: Halo Infinite
games.description: The next installment in the Halo franchise, featuring an open-world environment and the return of the Master Chief.

games.name: New Pokemon Snap
games.description: A photography simulation game where players take pictures of Pokemon in their natural habitats.

games.name: Shin Megami Tensei V
games.description: A Japanese role-playing game where players negotiate with and recruit demons to fight alongside them.

games.name: Tales of Arise
games.description: A role-playing game following two characters from different worlds as they fight to change their fate.

games.name: Mass Effect Legendary Edition
games.description: A compilation of the remastered editions of the Mass Effect trilogy with updated graphics and gameplay enhancements.

games.name: Hitman 3
games.description: The final installment in the World of Assassination trilogy, continuing the story of Agent 47.

games.name: Scarlet Nexus
games.description: Players assume the role of Yuito Sumeragi, a new recruit to the OSF aiming to become an elite psionic, and uncover the mysteries of a Brain Punk future caught between technology and psychic abilities.

games.name: Chivalry 2
games.description: A multiplayer first person slasher inspired by epic medieval movie battles.

games.name: Mario Golf: Super Rush
games.description: The latest installment in the Mario Golf series, featuring various modes and characters from the Mario universe.

games.name: Death Stranding Director's Cut
games.description: An extended version of Death Stranding with additional content and enhanced gameplay features.

games.name: Axiom Verge 2
games.description: A sequel to the critically acclaimed Axiom Verge, a 2D side-scrolling exploration game.

games.name: Psychonauts 2
games.description: A long-awaited sequel to the original Psychonauts, following Razputin's journey to become a full-fledged Psychonaut.

games.name: Diablo II: Resurrected
games.description: A remastered version of the classic game Diablo II, featuring updated graphics and quality of life improvements.

games.name: Metroid Dread
games.description: The latest installment in the Metroid series, featuring the return of Samus Aran in a 2D side-scrolling adventure.

games.name: Far Cry 6
games.description: An open-world first-person shooter set in a fictional Caribbean island, as players fight against a dictatorial regime.

games.name: Age of Empires IV
games.description: The latest installment in the Age of Empires series, featuring new civilizations and historical campaigns.

games.name: Call of Duty: Vanguard
games.description: The latest installment in the Call of Duty franchise, set during World War II.

games.name: Battlefield 2042
games.description: A first-person shooter set in a near-future world, featuring large-scale battles and destructible environments.

games.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
games.description: An action-adventure game following the Guardians of the Galaxy as they battle cosmic threats.

games.name: Alan Wake Remastered
games.description: A remastered edition of the classic Alan Wake game, featuring updated graphics and gameplay enhancements.

games.name: Kerbal Space Program 2
games.description: A space flight simulation game where players design and build rockets to explore the cosmos.

games.name: Riders Republic
games.description: An extreme sports game set in an open-world environment, featuring a variety of activities like biking, skiing, and flying.

games.name: Sable
games.description: An exploration game set in a desert world, as players uncover ancient mysteries and discover their place in the world.

games.name: New World
games.description: An open-world MMORPG set in a mysterious island, featuring a player-driven economy and large-scale battles.
